datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard have processes in place for maintaining access to livelihoods for surrounding communities?
Does the standard include criteria on food security assessments in the case of significant land use changes or changes in land tenure/ ownership?

Does the standard require the unit of operation to conduct an impacts assessment of business operations on the health, safety and security of local communities, and take measures to minimize and mitigate any negative impacts from operations on those surrounding communities.
Does the standard require that producers consult and engage in dialogue with local communities?
Does the standard require that interpretive materials and behavior guidelines pertaining to resource use are made available for workers and visitors?
Does the standard include criteria relating to community access to cultural heritage sites?
Does the standard require the unit of operation to have in place a resettlement action plan designed to provide compensation and benefits for displaced persons?
Does the standard include criteria on compensation mechanisms for the utilization of traditional knowledge?
Does the standard include criteria relating to the development of a code of conduct for security personnel and their interaction with local communities?
Does the standard require the unit of operation to engage and consult with local communities regarding changes or impacts from business activities on local resources and communities?
Standard includes criteria relating to establishment of a code of conduct for working with local and indigenous communities
Does the standard require the inclusion of gender considerations in impacts and risks assessments of the unit of operation
Does the standard require equal inclusion on the basis of gender in the stakeholder engagement process
Does the standard include criteria to seek Free, Prior and Informed Consent (FPIC) of local communities?
Does the standard include a general principle addressing gender issues when interacting with local communities?
Does the standard require policy development and implentation of initiatives that promote gender equality?
Does the standard include criteria to address grievances and provide fair compensation for negative impacts of operations on local communities and individuals?
Does the standard require compliance with REACH
Does the standard include criteria relating to hiring workers from local communities?
Does the standard include criteria relating to the trade of historical, cultural and archeological artifacts?
Does the standard address basic culture and human rights as defined by the UN Universal Declaration of Human Rights?
Does the standard require an assessment of impacts from business activities on access to basic services for local communities, as well as implement measures to resolve related disputes?
Does the standard include criteria on the rights of indigenous and tribal peoples as defined in ILO 169?
Does the standard include criteria on the ackowledgement and protection of internationally recognized/legally protected sites of cultural and religious significance.
Does the standard include criteria relating to involuntary resettlement, physical displacement and/or economic displacement resulting from business operations?
Does the standard explicitly address the issue of legal land title and use rights, such as land ownership issues etc.
Does the standard require the unit of operation to have in place a livelihood restoration policy?
Does the standard include criteria on maintaining local access to historical, cultural, archeological and spiritually important properties and sites?
Does the standard require the unit of operation to have in place a resettlement action plan for planning and implementing fair resettlement activities for affected communities/persons?
Does the standard include criteria on production practices promoting healthy and nutrient rich food?
Does the standard include criteria on food and feed loss in subsequent stages of the food supply chain?
Does the standard include criteria promoting the purchase of local materials, goods, products and services (e.g. Implements a "buy local" policy)?
Does the standard include criteria on the identification of legal and customary rights of tenure (incl. access and use of other parties that apply on the production/management unit)
Does the standard include criteria related to the active support of community development
Does the standard include criteria on the protection of local historical, archaeological, cultural, and spiritual properties and sites?
Does the standard require the unit of operation support economic development of local communities by providing opportunities for local employment and provision of services?
Does the standard include the promotion/enhancement of education?
Does the standard include criteria related to the provision of housing and sanitary facilities for workers and their families.
Does the standard include criteria requiring access to medical care for workers and their families
Does the standard include criteria addressing protection of minority rights of indigenous peoples?
Does the standard include criteria on the protection of minority rights of marginalized groups?
Does the standard include criteria relating to respecting traditional and cultural production practices of indigenous/minority groups?
Does the standard include criteria on using local art, architecture and/or cultural heritage in design / for commercial purposes
Does the standard include criteria related to women specific health and safety issues?
